name: Flatreach Full Game
description:
Completed build of Flatreach

- find the keys required to open doors!

- figure out what switches will activate

- sprinting jumps are most effective

Assets used:

Stone and platform models:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/rock-collection-semirealistic-108994

Flatwatch mob model:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/npc-character-proto-series-132051 

Lava textures:

Ground texture:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/floors/hand-painted-stone-texture-73949
